name: Directed Poison
prereq: Spell Trickster Dedication; Ability To Cast Cloudkill
summary: When you cast cloudkill, you can modify it to be under your control.
description:
When you cast cloudkill, modify its duration to be sustained up to 1 minute, and modify its standard effect to include the following: The cloud doesn't move away from you each round. Once per round when you Sustain the Spell, you can move the cloud 10 feet in the direction of your choice.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
